description:
During the Super Mega Awesome Battle Dream Supreme ( match ID 28439), Team Dragon destroyed Team Nightmare, round by round. This was the beginning of the war between these teams for season 10. Team Dragon and Team Nightmare met month after month to fight on our mats for sexual supremacy. Dragon beat nightmare round by round in SMABDS but nightmare has dismantled Dragon match by match this season. We accumulated all the points for the matches this season. Nightmare scored a total of 5230 pts to Dragon's 4818. Nightmare will start with a 412 pt advantage going into the finals.
Today we have the best of best on the mats, each fighting for 1 round. Knowing that they will only be tasked with fighting one round, each wrestler pushes herself harder than she ever has. This is The most exciting Tag match in the history of Ultimate Surrender
round 1: Team Dragon:
Serena Blair &
Sophia Fiore vs. Team Nightmare: Beretta James & Bella Wilde
round 2: Team Dragon:
Penny Barber &
Daisy Ducati vs. Team Nightmare: Darling & Bella Rossi
round 3: Team Dragon:
Cheyenne Jewel &
Dragon Lily vs. Team Nightmare: Jayogen & Isamar Gutierrez
Losing team does a "Biggest Loser" sex fight challege where the first one to come get fucked hard by the Refs. The rest of the losing team gets dominated and fucked in front of a live audience.
title: Rounds 1-4 Tag Team Finale. Wrestling rounds and a 12 girl Fuck Fest
